sub_topic: Finding the perimeter of a regular polygon.
message_1: A regular octagon has a side length of 9 cm. What is its perimeter?
message_2:
A regular octagon has 8 equal sides. To find the perimeter, simply multiply the side length (9 cm) by the number of sides (8).

Perimeter = 9 cm Ã— 8 = 72 cm
